statements: SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, season FROM product_demand WHERE inventory_level > 100;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_demand WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT season, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_demand GROUP BY season;
SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(demand_history) > 10;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM product_demand WHERE season='Winter';
SELECT * FROM product_demand WHERE inventory_level > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, season FROM product_demand WHERE inventory_level < 50 AND season='Spring' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, JSON_VALUE(demand_history, '$.year_2020') AS demand_2020 FROM product_demand WHERE JSON_VALUE(demand_history, '$.year_2020') > 100 ORDER BY demand_2020 DESC;
SELECT product_name, season, JSON_QUERY(demand_history, '$') AS demand_history FROM product_demand WHERE product_name LIKE 'Product%' ORDER BY season, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 AND season='Summer';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category='Gadgets' AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND season = 'Summer'
SELECT product_name, category, season FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 AND category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories')
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 30 AND (category = 'Food' OR season = 'Winter')
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100)
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_month, forecasted_demand FROM forecasts WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecast_month ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, stock_quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sales, AVG(total_revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 100
SELECT p.product_name, f.forecasted_demand FROM products p JOIN forecasts f ON p.product_id = f.product_id WHERE f.forecast_month = '2022-06-01'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10
SELECT * FROM SeasonalProducts;
SELECT product_name, season, demand FROM SeasonalProducts ORDER BY season DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand FROM SeasonalProducts WHERE season='Summer';
SELECT product_id, product_name, season, demand FROM SeasonalProducts WHERE demand > 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalProducts ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, season FROM SeasonalProducts WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT product_name, demand FROM SeasonalProducts WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date FROM Forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products INNER JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone LIKE '123%'
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 1
